pages.title: üîÆ Alchemy Overview
pages.description:
Alchemy lets you brew potions that grant powerful status effects.

Potions provide strong buffs but increase **Strain**, which raises the chance future potions fail.

For exact potion recipes and effects, use:
`!details potions`

fields.name: Core Idea
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Brew potions using ingredients
‚Ä¢ Drink potions to gain effects

pages.description:
You must own a **Brewing Stand** to brew potions.

Your Brewing Stand level limits what tier of potion you can craft.

fields.name: Stand Tiers
fields.value:
Level 1 ‚Üí Tier 1 potions
Level 2 ‚Üí Tier 1-2 potions
Level 3 ‚Üí Tier 1-3 potions

fields.name: Using your potions
fields.value:
`!use <potion name>`
eg: !use Potion Of Faster Recovery I

pages.title: ‚ú® Effects System
pages.description: Potions apply status effects to you.

fields.name: Rules
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Only one active effect at a time
‚Ä¢ New effect overwrites old effect
‚Ä¢ Effects may expire
‚Ä¢ Some effects are infinite

pages.title: ‚ò£Ô∏è Strain System
pages.description: Strain represents how poisoned your body is from potion usage.

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Strain range: 0 - 100
‚Ä¢ Strain value = % chance potion fails
‚Ä¢ At 100 strain ‚Üí potion always fails
‚Ä¢ Strain slowly decreases over time

fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Failed strain roll wastes the potion
‚Ä¢ Expired effects automatically deactivate
‚Ä¢ Stronger potions usually add more strain
